quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Do not let anything that happens in life be important enough that you’re willing to close your heart over it.
author: Michael A. Singer

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone else's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Sometimes you will never know the value of a moment, until it becomes a memory.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: It isn't where you came from. It's where you're going that counts.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
author: George Eliot

quote: Stay close to anything that makes you glad you are alive.
author: Hafez

quote: Some people look for a beautiful place. Others make a place beautiful.
author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quote: Happiness is not by chance, but by choice.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: You are enough just as you are.
author: Meghan Markle

quote: Complexity is the enemy of Execution.
author: Tony Tobbins

quote: The bad news is time flies. The good news is you're the pilot.
author: Michael Altshuler

quote: Spread love everywhere you go.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Today’s accomplishments were yesterday’s impossibilities.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don’t Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.
author: Unknown

quote: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.
author: Rob Siltanen

quote: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Only you can take inner freedom away from yourself, or give it to yourself. Nobody else can.
author: Michael A. Singer

quote: Creativity Is Intelligence Having Fun.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: You cannot change your destination overnight, but you can change your direction overnight.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Fake It Until You Make It! Act As If You Had All The Confidence You Require Until It Becomes Your Reality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out.
author: John Wooden

quote: You Don’t Have To Be Great To Start, But You Have To Start To Be Great.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A Clear Vision, Backed By Definite Plans, Gives You A Tremendous Feeling Of Confidence And Personal Power.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: There Are No Limits To What You Can Accomplish, Except The Limits You Place On Your Own Thinking.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: Many of life’s failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one’s destiny to do, and then do it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: if you want the rainbow, you gotta put up with the rain.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Live for each second without hesitation.
author: Elton John

quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.
author: Confucius

quote: The healthiest response to life is joy.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Life is ten percent what happens to you and ninety percent how you respond to it.
author: Charles Swindoll

quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there’s so much to smile about.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
author: Buddha

quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
author: Kevin Kruse

quote: The quality of your life is the quality of where you live emotionally.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Every moment is a fresh beginning.
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You must expect great things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: There are no mistakes, only opportunities.
author: Tina Fey

quote: If you don’t like how things are, change it! You’re not a tree.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: If you love life, don’t waste time, for time is what life is made up of.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Never take life seriously. Nobody gets out alive anyway.
author: Anonymous

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: The secret of happiness, you see is not found in seeking more, but in developing the capacity to enjoy less.
author: Socrates

quote: It’s never too late. Never too late to start over, never too late to be happy.
author: Jane Fonda

quote: You’re only human. You live once and life is wonderful, so eat the damned red velvet cupcake.
author: Emma Stone

quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: In the long run, the sharpest weapon of all is a kind and gentle spirit.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Nothing is more honorable than a grateful heart.
author: Seneca

quote: When you are grateful fear disappears and abundance appears.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life.
author: Buddha

quote: As you know, life is an echo; we get what we give.
author: David DeNotaris

quote: There are no regrets in life, just lessons.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning to dance in the rain.
author: Vivian Greene

quote: Today, you have 100% of your life left.
author: Tom Landry

quote: Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
author: George Halas

quote: Make each day your masterpiece.
author: John Wooden

quote: True personal growth is about transcending the part of you that is not okay and needs protection.
author: Michael A. Singer

quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Every problem is a gift–without problems we would not grow.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion'.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Give light and people will find the way.
author: Ella Baker

quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: The only journey is the one within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
author: Max Lucado

quote: Start from wherever you are and with whatever you’ve got.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Self-esteem means knowing you are the dream.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Even if it makes others uncomfortable, I will love who I am.
author: Janelle Monae

quote: What I know for sure is that speaking your truth is the most powerful tool we all have.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I have standards I don’t plan on lowering for anybody, including myself.
author: Zendaya

quote: Service is the rent that you pay for room on this earth.
author: Shirley Chisholm

quote: Just keep taking chances and having fun.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
author: Buddha

quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
author: Confucius

quote: Your past does not equal your future.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: On earth there is no heaven, but there are pieces of it.
author: Jules Renard

quote: If you carry joy in your heart, you can heal any moment.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: It always seems impossible until its done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Success is a journey not a destination.
author: Ben Sweetland

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into place.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Be there for others, but never leave yourself behind.
author: Dodinsky

quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: We are the hero of our own story.
author: Mary McCarthy

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Impossible is just an opinion.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: You can either experience the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The choice is yours.
author: Unknown

quote: Progress equals happiness.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: Magic is believing in yourself. If you can make that happen, you can make anything happen.
author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

quote: One day or day one. You decide.
author: Unknown

quote: Learn how to be happy with what you have while you pursue all that you want.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The miracle is not that we do this work, but that we are happy to do it.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded there.
author: Dr. Wayne Dyer

quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
author: Lao Tzu
